remarks: If ` F ` is created by adding a single term ` ( F `` X ) = Y ` to ` G ` , where ` X ` is larger than any element of the support of ` G ` , then ` F ` is also a finitely supported function and it is assigned the value ` ( ( A ^o X ) .o Y ) +o z ` where ` z ` is the value of ` G ` .
